connection.title: FluidNC Instalador Web
connection.description: Esta herramienta facilitará la instalación o actualización de FluidNC en su controlador. Conecte el controlador y pulse "Conectar" para continuar.

home.description: Ahora está conectado a un dispositivo, elija una acción a continuación
home.error-while-booting: Se produjo un error durante el arranque, probablemente debido a una configuración no válida.
home.show-details: Haga clic aquí para ver los detalles

file-browser.title: Explorador de archivos
file-browser.config-missing: Falta el archivo de configuración "{{configFilename}}", ¿desea crearlo?

terminal.title: Terminal
terminal.restart-description: Does a hard reset on the controller by setting DTR/RTS
terminal.reset-description: Resets the controller with a 0x18 command

firmware.install-description: Select which firmware you want to install on your controller.

bootloader.waiting: Waiting for controller to enter bootloader...
bootloader.not-active: Bootloader not active - Try holding down the BOOT switch

unsupported.title: Browser not supported
unsupported.description: Your current web browser is not supported, please use Chrome, Edge or Opera instead

installer.error-reconnecting: An error occured while reconnecting, please reboot the controller
installer.done-description: The controller has been successfully installed and is ready to be used.
installer.confirm-installation-description: This will install the firmware "{{release}}" to the controller. It will {{not}} erase the controller.
installer.installation-speed-help: Some controllers need to be installed at a lower speed. If you are experiencing problems you can try and decrease the speed.
installer.select-image-description1: If you have downloaded a package manually you can flash the image from here.
installer.select-image-description2: Select the firmware.bin file to flash the controller with.

lost-connection.description: Lost the connection to the controller

install.install-description: The controller does not seem to have FluidNC installed, do you wish to install it?

terminal.open-terminal-description: Open a serial terminal to your controller

donate.description: Please consider a donation to the FluidNC project via the links below to keep it going.
